content.body: looks like compile-time imports for wasm are going to ship: https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/blink-dev/c/zww0CT9PRVw/m/YmtNkC4jAQAJ
was there ever a strategy worked out for integrating that with the source-phase imports proposal?
Source phase imports give you a WebAssembly.Module instance, so then you can instantiate it with that
content.formatted_body: Source phase imports give you a WebAssembly.Module instance, so then you can instantiate it with that
